title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 183: Featuring Nick Kypreos
description:
On Monday's episode of Spittin' Chiclets the guys are joined by Nick Kypreos of Sportsnet to talk about his career, some hilarious stories and to discuss how he broke into the media industry. The boys also break down the Bruins big win over the Blues in Game 6 and preview Game 7. The guys also discuss the St. Louis Post Dispatch and their major fuck up as well as the Jeff Skinner signing.

Â 


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
